cbsDiskId.description: Unique id of the persistent disk resource. Used to identify the disk in Qcloud

fsType.description: Filesystem type to mount. Must be a filesystem type supported by the host operating system. Ex. "ext4", "xfs", "ntfs". Implicitly inferred to be "ext4" if unspecified.

readOnly.description: Optional: Defaults to false (read/write). ReadOnly here will force the ReadOnly setting in VolumeMounts.
